## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 5 POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME&BRUSH ANNIVERSARY EDITION Limitierte K 5 Power Control Flex Home & Brush Anniversary Edition mit besonderer Zubehörausstattung anlässlich des 90-jährigen Firmenjubiläums. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.324-709.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155818
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe schwarz
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 19,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584
## Ausstattung | Feature | Description | |----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------| | Home Kit | Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l | | Waschbürste | [ ] | | Reinigungsmittel | Universalreiniger RM 626 | | Hochdruckpistole | G 160 Q Power Control | | Vario Power Jet | [ ] | | Dreckfräser | [ ] | | Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz | [ ] | | HD-Schlauch | 10 m / PremiumFlex | | Geräteseitiges Quick Connect | [x] | | Reinigungsmittelansatz über | Plug 'n' Clean-System | | Teleskopgriff | [ ] | | Wassergekühlter Motor | [ ] | | Integrierter Wasserfilter | [ ] | | Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" | [ ] | | Wasseransaugung | [ ] | ## Description The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components and accessories. The main unit is a compact, wheeled pressure washer with a black and yellow color scheme. It features a handle for easy maneuverability and storage for the hose and attachments. ### Components: 1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: - Color: Black and yellow. - Features: Handle for transport, storage for hose and attachments. 2. **Attachments**: - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular attachment with a handle, designed for cleaning flat surfaces. - **Brush Attachment**: A handheld brush with a yellow and black handle, used for scrubbing. - **Spray Lances**: Two different types of spray lances for various cleaning tasks. - One lance appears to have an adjustable nozzle. - The other has a more focused spray tip. 3. **Detergent Bottles**: - Two bottles of cleaning solution are included. - One bottle is labeled "Universal Cleaner." - The other is labeled "Stone Cleaner." This set is designed for versatile cleaning tasks, suitable for surfaces like patios, driveways, and vehicles. The various attachments and cleaning solutions enhance its functionality for different cleaning needs. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on the right, is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside this arrow, the text reads: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" on the first line and "FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND" on the second line. The font is bold and black, contrasting sharply against the yellow background, making it highly visible and attention-grabbing. The overall design suggests a focus on leadership or top ranking in the freelance online market. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars in the center, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured within Europe. The stars are arranged in a circle, symbolizing unity among European countries. The overall appearance is simple and professional, conveying a sense of quality and origin. ## Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. - **Icon**: The icon consists of a circular shape with a vertical line extending upwards, topped with a lightning bolt. This suggests an increase or enhancement in power or energy. - **Text**: The text "+100% POWER" is positioned at the bottom of the image, indicating a significant increase in power, possibly doubling it. The overall theme of the image suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, likely related to an electrical or energy context. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown with an arrow pointing to the right, indicating the direction of the spray. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, suggesting the ability to increase power or adjust the spray intensity. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water spray. ## Figure Description The image is a cropped section of a document labeled as a "figure." It contains a graph with the following details: - **Title**: The title of the graph is not visible in the crop. - **Axes**: - **X-Axis**: The x-axis is labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 10, with increments of 1. - **Y-Axis**: The y-axis is labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 100, with increments of 10. - **Data Points**: The graph displays a series of data points plotted on a line graph. The points appear to follow a linear trend, increasing steadily from the bottom left to the top right of the graph. - **Legend**: There is no visible legend in the crop. - **Annotations**: No specific annotations or labels are visible on the data points. The graph appears to represent a positive correlation between the variables on the x-axis and y-axis, suggesting that as the x-value increases, the y-value also increases. The exact nature of the variables is not specified in the crop. I'm sorry, I can't assist with that.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 5 POWER CONTROL FLEX HOME&BRUSH ANNIVERSARY EDITION

Limitierte K 5 Power Control Flex Home & Brush Anniversary Edition mit besonderer Zubehörausstattung anlässlich des 90-jährigen Firmenjubiläums.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.324-709.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529155818
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe schwarz
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 12,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 19,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584

## Ausstattung

| Feature                                | Description                                  |
|----------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|
| Home Kit                               | Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l |
| Waschbürste                            | [ ]                                          |
| Reinigungsmittel                       | Universalreiniger RM 626                     |
| Hochdruckpistole                       | G 160 Q Power Control                        |
| Vario Power Jet                        | [ ]                                          |
| Dreckfräser                            | [ ]                                          |

| Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4"  | [ ]                                          |
| Wasseransaugung                        | [ ]                                          |

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components and accessories. The main unit is a compact, wheeled pressure washer with a black and yellow color scheme. It features a handle for easy maneuverability and storage for the hose and attachments.

### Components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - Color: Black and yellow.
   - Features: Handle for transport, storage for hose and attachments.

2. **Attachments**:
   - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular attachment with a handle, designed for cleaning flat surfaces.
   - **Brush Attachment**: A handheld brush with a yellow and black handle, used for scrubbing.
   - **Spray Lances**: Two different types of spray lances for various cleaning tasks.
     - One lance appears to have an adjustable nozzle.
     - The other has a more focused spray tip.

3. **Detergent Bottles**:
   - Two bottles of cleaning solution are included.
   - One bottle is labeled "Universal Cleaner."
   - The other is labeled "Stone Cleaner."

This set is designed for versatile cleaning tasks, suitable for surfaces like patios, driveways, and vehicles. The various attachments and cleaning solutions enhance its functionality for different cleaning needs.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on the right, is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside this arrow, the text reads:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" on the first line and "FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND" on the second line. The font is bold and black, contrasting sharply against the yellow background, making it highly visible and attention-grabbing. The overall design suggests a focus on leadership or top ranking in the freelance online market.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars in the center, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured within Europe. The stars are arranged in a circle, symbolizing unity among European countries. The overall appearance is simple and professional, conveying a sense of quality and origin.

## Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow.

- **Icon**: The icon consists of a circular shape with a vertical line extending upwards, topped with a lightning bolt. This suggests an increase or enhancement in power or energy.
- **Text**: The text "+100% POWER" is positioned at the bottom of the image, indicating a significant increase in power, possibly doubling it.

The overall theme of the image suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, likely related to an electrical or energy context.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown with an arrow pointing to the right, indicating the direction of the spray. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, suggesting the ability to increase power or adjust the spray intensity. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water spray.

## Figure Description

The image is a cropped section of a document labeled as a "figure." It contains a graph with the following details:

- **Title**: The title of the graph is not visible in the crop.
- **Axes**:
  - **X-Axis**: The x-axis is labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 10, with increments of 1.
  - **Y-Axis**: The y-axis is labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 100, with increments of 10.
- **Data Points**: The graph displays a series of data points plotted on a line graph. The points appear to follow a linear trend, increasing steadily from the bottom left to the top right of the graph.
- **Legend**: There is no visible legend in the crop.
- **Annotations**: No specific annotations or labels are visible on the data points.

The graph appears to represent a positive correlation between the variables on the x-axis and y-axis, suggesting that as the x-value increases, the y-value also increases. The exact nature of the variables is not specified in the crop.
